document.heading: STREET FESTIVAL ONE DAY PUBLIC SPACE RENTAL AMENDMENT ACT OF 2000

history.narrative: Law 13-258, the “Street Festival One Day Public Space Rental Amendment Act of 2000”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 13-798, which was referred to the Committee on Public Works and the Environment. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 8, 2000, and December 5, 2000, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 22, 2000, it was assigned Act No. 13-545 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 13-258 became effective on April 3, 2001.
